name: Weeping Walls
description:
A schizophrenic finds himself in an abandoned asylum, but something is going on in the walls.

This game taught me a lot of basic stuffs in game design and I get to use a lot of techniques to tackle technical problems during development. All the horror SFXs were created by myself using Audacity and I enjoyed the whole process. 

License my voice acting here used in the game http://cbr.sh/g8w935
